modules.text: Feudi di San Gregorio is the winery that has been enhancing the native grape varieties of the Campania region for over thirty years. As Frontend Developer I was in charge of the realization of their institutional website, with React, Redux, RX and REST API.

modules.title: The challenge
modules.text:
I remember this project because it was a challenge against time. Efforts were made to maximize the creative and artistic traits of the brand. Each section of the site has a significantly different layout. The "Our Wines" section, for example, is navigable with the movement of the mouse.

It was a challenge to get the project done on time, and perhaps because of that it is one of my favorite projects.
